title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item for the first time in the library outline view, it is not possible.

Observed Behavior: The item cannot be selected on the first try.

Expected Behavior: The item should be selectable on the first try.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
3. Observe that the item cannot be selected on the first try.
OB: The item cannot be selected on the first try.
EB: The item should be selectable on the first try.
SR:
1. Add a label to the library file. 
2. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view. 
3. Observe that the item cannot be selected on the first try.
